00083 static string GetGameListURL()
00084 {
00085     return sMainURL + sMainPage + "&action=raw";
00086 }
00087 
00088 static string GetWikiPageURL( const string& sPage )
00089 {
00090     return sMainURL + sMainPage + ":" + sPage + "&action=raw";
00091 }
